page.title: 18A Mum's day
page.content: My Mum wakes up at about 7.00 am. She dresses,washes and goes downstairs to make breakfast for my brother and I. After breakfast she washes up and makes my younger brother get ready for school. Then she hoovers and polishes downstairs. At about 8.45am she sends my brother off to school and then she watches the end of Breakfast TV. When this has finished she will go upstairs & make our beds. About 9.45 she gets ready for work; she works at the local pub, The 'Rose And Crown'. Mum starts work at 10.30. She cleans the bar & makes sure that everything is ready for opening time-from 11.00 until 2.30. She serves drinks and food to customers. She returns home around 3.15., has a cup of tea and starts to prepare tea for the family. When tea is over and she has done the washing-up,she watches TV until 10.30.
